mapper.select: select p.PD_NUM, p.PD_NAME, p.CTG_CODE, pc.CTG_CODEREF, pc.CTG_NAME, PD_PRICE, PD_STOCK, PD_CONTENT, PD_MAINIMAGE, PD_REGISTER_DATETIME, p.PD_MAINIMAGE, p.PD_SUBIMAGE from PRODUCT p inner join PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC on p.CTG_CODE = PC.CTG_CODE where p.CTG_CODE = #{ctg_code, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into CART(CART_ID, MEM_ID, PD_NUM, CART_STOCK) values (CART_SEQ.nextval, #{mem_id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{pd_num, jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{cart_stock, jdbcType = NUMERIC})
mapper.delete: delete CART where CART_ID = #{cart_id, jdbcType = NUMERIC} and MEM_ID = #{mem_id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update CART set CART_STOCK = #{cart_stock, jdbcType = NUMERIC} where CART_ID = #{cart_id, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select row_number() over (order by c.CART_ID desc) as num, c.CART_ID, c.MEM_ID, c.PD_NUM, c.CART_STOCK, c.CART_REGISTER_DATETIME, p.PD_NAME, p.PD_PRICE, p.PD_SUBIMAGE, p.CTG_CODE, pc.CTG_NAME from CART c inner join PRODUCT p on c.PD_NUM = p.PD_NUM inner join PRODUCT_CATEGORY pc on p.CTG_CODE = pc.CTG_CODE where c.MEM_ID = #{mem_id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
select * from CART where MEM_ID = #{mem_id, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and PD_NUM = #{pd_num, jdbcType = NUMERIC}
